entry.title: GLOW Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Body Oil
Price: 25.00

Luxe body oil with an entrancing scent.  Made with nourishing plant oils to help hydrate, restore, and promote radiant skin.  

Ingredients

*Helianthus Annuus (sunflower seed) oil, *Argania Spinosa Kernel oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Seed oil, *Cannabis Sativa (hempseed) oil, Tocopherols (vitamin E), Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Fruit Oil, *Symphytum officinale (comfrey) leaf, Calendula officinalis (calendula) flower, *Achillea Millefolium (yarrow) flower, *Plantago major (plantain) leaf, Aniba rosaeodora (rosewood) Wood oil, Vanilla planifolia oil.

entry.title: Chocolate Mandarin Hand, Body and Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Skin Treatment
Price: 18.00

This rich balm is ideal for moisturizing and soothing dry, rough skin. Within a few seconds of application the skin appears and feels noticeably softer and smoother. Chocolate Mandarin is an excellent option for those who have dehydrated skin, as the key ingredients offer a rich, long lasting hydration that help to naturally improve the skin’s overall elasticity, texture and moisture.

Features + Benefits

  • Hydrates and soothes dry, chapped, and sensitive skin
  • Offers rich, long lasting hydration for dry hands, heels, and lips
  • Naturally concentrated formula helps maintain softer, smoother skin
  • Subtle cocoa butter and orange natural aroma.
  • Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Gluten Free and Fair Trade

Composition

This fresh organic formulation effectively softens and nourishes, while the vast amount of cocoa butter keeps the skin flexible, sealing in moisture.

Ingredients

Jojoba Seed Oil*, Cocoa Butter*, Beeswax, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Coconut Oil*, Castor Oil*, Orange Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E) *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Good Fats Body Butter (2oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Body Butter
Price: 14.00

A unique blend of plant-based oils which leaves skin baby soft and without greasy residue.  Say goodbye to plastics, petrol chemicals and harsh fragrances. Stay ultra-hydrated with this all-natural and oh-so-creamy butter that absorbs into the skin within 90 seconds. 

Features + Benefits

  • A Natural Humectant – meaning it helps your skin draw in moisture to stay hydrated.
  • Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Chemical-free.
  • Choose Your Plant-Based Scent – or go Unscented.
  • Comes in 2oz recyclable and returnable aluminum tin.

Ingredients

Organic Avocado Butter, Organic Olive Butter, Organic Avocado Oil, Essential Oils
